snippet: The Marines were killed while they were clearing unexploded ordnance at an artillery range at the base outside San Diego, military officials said.
abstract: Four Marines are killed in an accident during maintenance of an artillery range at Camp Pendleton, outside San Diego.
lead_paragraph: The Marines were killed while they were clearing unexploded ordnance at an artillery range at the base outside San Diego, military officials said.

headline.main: Four Marines Are Killed in Camp Pendleton Accident
headline.print_headline: Four Marines Are Killed In Camp Pendleton Accident
